programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: After a 45-day stint in Iraq and two hurricanes, an explosive-sniffing ATF Labrador retriever begins exhibiting severe symptoms of terror.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps an overly aggressive German shepherd and a timid rat terrier.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help bring peace to Jennifer Lee Pryor's home, where fights have been breaking out among foster dogs and her own four dogs; an aggressive beagle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two troubled dogs, and their families, win sessions with Cesar after auditioning at a pet store in Orange County, Calif.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Doberman/Lab and a pit bull develop behavioral issues after not being walked for months; an Italian greyhound acts aggressively toward the men of the house.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Dave Glassman adopts pit bulls Blackjack and Memphis together, but one day during a barking fit, the two dogs turn on each other.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar works to dial down the bad behaviors of four problem dogs who won sessions at the PETCO auditions.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar celebrates the show's 100th episode with a grand reunion of many of the past guests and their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Daschund Lotus is very territorial; his aggression sends his owner Chari to the hospital; Cesar makes a house call to see Joey, a German Shepard who is territorial over the second story of his owner's home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog is nervous around other dogs and occasionally nips at people; a Vizsla who resists going outside due to her fear of cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A couple's Chihuahua mix terrorizes their mastiff and dominates the house; a pit bull is not growing out of his puppy behavior.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive English bulldog/Lab mix; a cocker spaniel with a life-threatening appetite for paper products.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps dogs overcome their fears including a whippet mix who is blind and deaf, a labradoodle that fears the ocean, and a cocker spaniel that fears all humans.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar meets NASCAR driver Kevin Harvick to help with his snappy Chihuahua and an aggressive Pekingese called Gizmo.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps fitness guru Jillian Michaels with her aggressive Chihuahua, while "Frasier" star Kelsey Grammer needs help house-training his dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Holly, a Labrador puppy, displays severe food aggression; a women's shelter will take a needy woman and her pit bull, Tucker, but Cesar must help the dog become less protective first.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Chihuahua is a pint-sized peril to its owner's roommate; slobbering Great Dane afraid of shiny floors.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A charmer around people, Opie becomes aggressive around other dogs; Flirt the Chinese Crested is hyper and neurotic.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A vizsla with a biting problem is afraid of everything; a Shetland sheepdog barks at household appliances.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Josh, a Maltese-poodle mix, won't let anyone go near him with a brush; Boomer, a clownish dog, must always be the center of attention.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Harry goes crazy at anything on wheels; shadows drive Brooks crazy.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help a boxer named Coach before he is put down for biting someone; Sueki turns her nose up at leads.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help Slick a fear-ridden dog who was rescued after living in a crate for 15 hours a day and Pepper, another rescue dog with issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Ava, a small mixed-breed spins constantly; Gus, a large dog who greets people by throwing its body at them.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Churchill is usually a well-mannered dog, but around other animals he's a monster, and lovable pit bull Maya can be a handful.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar takes the spoiled Bubba down a notch; discover why German shepherd Garret never stops chasing his tail.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Emily, the pit bull, is sent to doggie boot camp because she is so quick to attack other dogs that her owners can no longer walk her.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A rescued mastiff likes to chew everything and barks incessantly; Paris is a temperamental, long-haired Chihuahua.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: When Linda tries to walk Jake, he goes mad to protect her; Chantel wants to walk her 150-pound rottweiler King.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Scrawny is the favorite dog in his household, but popularity has gone to his head; Lola the dalmatian is spoiled.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A 12-year-old beagle mix displays unpredictable aggression; a couple tries to fit an aggressive puppy into their family.
